annotations.description: Here’s how to make the Voodoo Grog, a tiki cocktail that’s a combination of Navy Grog from Don the Beachcomber and from Trader Vic, only taken to the next le...
annotations.title: Voodoo Grog - How to Make Trader Vic's Tiki Drink & the History of Pop Culture Voodoo

textContent:
1 oz (30 ml) Aged AOC Martinique Rhum Agricole (ESB or Ambr√©)
1 oz (30 ml) Gold Rum (Aged Haitian Rhum preferred)
0.75 oz (22 ml) Lime Juice
0.75 oz (22 ml) Grapefruit Juice
0.75 oz (22 ml) Passion Fruit Syrup
0.5 oz (15 ml) Pimento Dram (Allspice Liqueur)
0.25 oz (7 ml) Honey Syrup (3:1)
1 Egg White
8 oz (240 ml) Crushed Ice
Garnish: fresh grated Nutmeg, Cherry, Pineapple & Mint

Blend all—but garnish—on High for 20 seconds. Pour into mug or double old fashioned glass. Add garnish. Grate nutmeg.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RzdYFzocSC0
title: Voodoo Grog
